title: Did Aamir Khan meet Turkish Prez after he spoke against India on Kashmir? Here’s the truth | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A picture of Bollywood actor Aamir Khan with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan is being circulated on social media with the claim that the duo met recently.

The caption of the picture read: फिल्म अभिनेता आमिर खान तुर्की के राष्ट्रपति से तुर्की मे मिलने को गये*…………. तुर्की का भारत विरोध और पाकिस्तान प्रेम जग जाहिर है *शर्मनाक

Several Twitter users shared the same photo with different captions;

Various Facebook users are sharing the similar post.

ALSO READ: Fact Check: These pictures of women bleeding is not from Delhi

NewsMobile fact-checked the above posts and we found that the claims attached to the picture are false.

On putting the picture in question through Reverse Image Search on Yandex, we found the viral image on Getty Images.

According to the caption, the picture was clicked in Ankara, Turkey on October 6, 2017, by Kayhan Ozer.

In conclusion, the above information proves that the claim that Bollywood actor Aamir Khan met Turkey Prez Erdogan after the latter’s recent comment on section 370 is FALSE.

If you want to fact-check any story, WhatsApp it now on +91 88268 00707
